page.title: 06Entertainment.
page.content: Entertainment in Letham. Once a month, Jimmy Shand, the famous dance band leader comes to Letham Village Hall. He lives nearby in Auchtermuchty. Also in the band is Jimmy Shand Junior and a drummer. Diane Shand sings, dances, and plays the fiddle. People come from far and wide to listen and dance to Jimmy's band. They do traditional Scottish country dancesHalfway through the evening, tea and sandwiches are served. The ladies from the village who make and serve the refreshments donate the proceeds to charity. So far this has amounted to Â£1,496.
